item.title: Meta 推出独立人工智能应用程序，欲与 ChatGPT 竞争
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二发布了一款新的独立人工智能应用程序，希望与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 等其他流行聊天机器人展开竞争。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. released a new standalone artificial intelligence app on Tuesday in a bid to compete with other popular chatbots like OpenAI’s ChatGPT.】

item.title: 意大利银行称，特朗普推动加密货币可能引发全球风险
item.description: 意大利央行表示，如果美国对加密资产的推动最终助长了系统性风险，那么加密资产可能会给金融市场带来稳定风险。【原文：Cryptoassets could pose a stability risk to financial markets if the US push to embrace them ends up fostering systemic significance, according to the Bank of Italy.】

item.title: 英特尔称客户准备测试新生产技术
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）正试图打入由台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Intel Corp., trying to break into an outsourced chipmaking market dominated by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., said prospective clients are preparing to try out its new production process.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行应谨慎对待进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，由于全球环境不确定，欧洲央行应谨慎行事，进一步削减借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank should proceed carefully with additional cuts in borrowing costs due to the uncertain global environment, Governing Council Member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 波兰以美国政策风险为由下调 2025 年经济增长预期
item.description: 波兰政府以美国贸易政策和乌克兰战争等外部风险为由，下调了今年的经济增长目标。【原文：Poland’s government reduced its economic growth target for this year, citing external risks such as US trade policies and the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 据说勒索软件黑客是导致玛莎百货断电的原因
item.description: 据熟悉此次攻击的人士称，勒索软件攻击是导致马莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc.）业务中断的原因，黑客利用一种强大的恶意软件锁定了这家英国零售商的部分系统，使其无法访问。【原文：A ransomware attack is the cause of a disruption at Marks & Spencer Group Plc., with hackers using a potent kind of malware to lock down some of the British retailer’s systems and render them inaccessible, according to people familiar with the attack.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的艾伯塔省领导人在自由党赢得大选后发出挑衅之音
item.description: 在自由党连续第四次赢得加拿大大选后，艾伯塔省省长丹妮尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）承诺将与渥太华对抗，并表示她不会允许这个石油资源丰富的省份与联邦政府之间的 "现状 "继续下去。【原文：Alberta’s Premier Danielle Smith pledged to stand up to Ottawa after the Liberal Party’s fourth consecutive election victory in Canada, saying she would not allow the “status quo” between the oil-rich province and the federal government to continue.】

item.title: 英国财政部将与美国合作制定加密货币规则，消除欧盟的担忧
item.description: 英国政府将与美国官员合作制定计划，对蓬勃发展的加密货币行业进行监管，与欧洲对唐纳德-特朗普总统拥抱该行业的担忧保持距离。【原文：The UK government will collaborate with US officials on plans to regulate the burgeoning crypto industry, distancing itself from European concerns about President Donald Trump’s embrace of the sector.】

item.title: 富国银行将根据新计划回购 400 亿美元股票
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. announced a new $40 billion stock-buyback program, sending shares up.】

item.title: 比特币在四月关税动荡中跑赢黄金和科技股
item.description: 比特币在四月份超越了黄金和科技股，重新引发了关于这种最大的加密货币是否可以作为市场动荡（如美国全面关税引发的纷争）的避风港的争论。【原文：Bitcoin has surged past gold and tech stocks alike in April, rekindling the debate over whether the largest cryptocurrency serves as a refuge from market turmoil such as the strife triggered by sweeping US tariffs.】

item.title: 德意志银行称客户在询问欧洲的支出计划
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）表示，即将上任的德国政府计划在基础设施和国防领域投资数千亿欧元，欧洲也在推动加快该地区资本市场的一体化进程，这些都促使客户对德意志银行的兴趣大增。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG said a plan by the incoming German government to invest hundred of billions of euros in infrastructure and defense, as well a European push to speed up integration of the region’s capital markets, are fueling a surge in client interest.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心降至近五年最低点
item.description: 受关税影响，美国消费者对经济和劳动力市场前景的悲观情绪与日俱增，4 月份美国消费者信心降至近五年来的最低点。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in April to an almost five-year low on growing pessimism about prospects for the economy and labor market due to tariffs.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺降至9月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国上个月的职位空缺降至 9 月份以来的最低点，表明在经济不确定性增加的情况下劳动力需求疲软。【原文：US job openings fell last month to the lowest since September, indicating weaker labor demand amid increased economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 阿克塞尔-施普林格彻底改革监事会，完成分拆
item.description: 在完成分拆分类广告业务的交易后，阿克塞尔-施普林格公司（Axel Springer SE）将对其监事会进行彻底改革，并任命一位新主席。【原文：Axel Springer SE will overhaul its supervisory board and appoint a new chairman following its completion of a deal to spin off its classified ads business.】

item.title: 关税担忧升温，股市将结束五日连胜
item.description: 美国股市周二开盘下跌，将结束五日连涨，原因是多家公司警告经济不确定性上升，白宫有关关税的言论令投资者感到恐慌。【原文：US stocks opened lower Tuesday, set to snap a five-day winning streak, as a slew of companies warned of rising economic uncertainty and comments from the White House about tariffs spooked investors.】

item.title: 白宫批评后，亚马逊否认关税标签计划
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）周二表示，它从未计划广泛显示唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对产品征收关税的成本，因为白宫对这一举动进行了抨击。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. said Tuesday it never planned to widely display the cost of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on products after the White House blasted the reported move.】

item.title: 尽管面临美国关税风险，美的仍实现强劲营收
item.description: 尽管面临美国关税风险，但受益于中国对家电采购的补贴，美的集团股份有限公司第一季度收入和利润增长强劲。【原文：Midea Group Co. saw strong revenue and profit growth in the first quarter, as it benefited from Chinese subsidies for home appliance purchases despite facing US tariff risks.】

item.title: 创纪录的美国货物贸易逆差预示第一季度国内生产总值疲软
item.description: 美国商品贸易逆差在 3 月份意外扩大至创纪录水平，原因是企业继续进口商品以应对关税，这表明第一季度经济受到了巨大冲击。【原文：The US merchandise-trade deficit unexpectedly widened in March to a record as companies continued importing goods to get ahead of tariffs, indicating a large hit to the economy in the first quarter.】

item.title: 欧盟敦促废除迫使卖空者摆脱阴影的规则
item.description: 一个行业游说组织表示，欧盟应效仿英国，削减对卖空者的信息披露要求。【原文：The European Union should follow the UK in cutting disclosure requirements on short sellers, an industry lobby organization said.】

item.title: 从股票到美元，特朗普的 "黄金时代 "开局不利
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普宣誓就任第 47 任美国总统时，他宣称一个新的 "黄金时代 "即将来临。【原文：When Donald Trump was sworn in as the 47th US president, he proclaimed the dawning of a new “Golden Age.”】

item.title: 卡尼获胜后金融股领涨加拿大股市
item.description: 据加拿大帝国商业银行资本市场部（CIBC Capital Markets）称，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）领导的自由党在联邦大选中赢得最多席位后，金融股可能成为赢家。【原文：Financial stocks are the likely winners in Canada after Prime Minister Mark Carney’s Liberal Party won the most seats in the country’s federal election, according to CIBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 关税战搅乱经济前景，匈牙利维持关键利率不变
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势给经济前景蒙上阴影，匈牙利央行连续第七个月保持利率稳定。【原文：Hungary’s central bank held interest rates steady for a seventh month as global trade tensions cloud the economic outlook.】

item.title: 办公楼贷款问题预示着 6500 亿美元债券市场将面临问题
item.description: 上个月，与亚马逊公司总部相距不远的三栋西雅图办公楼拖欠了价值 1.35 亿美元的商业抵押贷款债务，这让为这些房产提供资金的债券投资者面临着漫长而不确定的资金回收问题。【原文：When three Seattle office buildings a short distance from Amazon.com Inc.’s headquarters defaulted on $135 million worth of commercial mortgage debt last month, it left bond investors who financed the properties facing a long and uncertain slog to claw back money.】

item.title: 印度期待在美国双边贸易谈判中 "早日互赢
item.description: 印度在与美国的谈判中发出了 "早日互赢 "的信号，因为两国距离在今年秋季之前达成第一批贸易协议的时间越来越近了。【原文：India signaled the possibility of “early mutual wins” in its negotiations with the US, as the two nations inch closer to sealing the first tranche of a trade deal by fall of this year.】

item.title: 中远航运季度利润在美国征税打击中国班轮之前大幅增长
item.description: 中远海运控股有限公司（Cosco Shipping Holdings Co.【原文：Cosco Shipping Holdings Co.’s profit jumped, along with improved revenue from its transpacific routes, as customers front-loaded shipments ahead of new fees from the US Trade Representative set to target Chinese shippers.】

item.title: 大使称中国不打算在印度倾销商品
item.description: 中国驻印度大使表示，中国无意以人为的低价商品打压市场，试图缓解人们对中国廉价产品可能涌入全球市场的担忧。【原文：China has no intention to undercut markets with artificially low-priced goods, the country’s ambassador to India said, seeking to ease concerns about a potential influx of cheap Chinese products into global markets.】

item.title: 印度最大银行计划今年通过出售股票筹集资金
item.description: 印度最大的贷款机构印度国家银行计划在本财年通过发行新股来筹集资金，此前一些私营同行也宣布了类似的计划。【原文：State Bank of India Ltd., the nation’s biggest lender, plans to raise capital by issuing new shares this fiscal year, following similar announcements by some of its private peers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油出口随着受制裁船只的返回而走高
item.description:
经批准的油轮在闲置数月后重返工作岗位

Sanctioned tankers return to work after lying idle for months

】

item.title: 天然气从 "桥梁 "转变为目的地
item.description:
一些电力公司已不再将这种燃料称为可再生能源的临时途径，而是将其作为长期计划的核心。【原文：

Some power companies have stopped calling the fuel a temporary pathway to renewable energy and are making it central to their long-range plans.

】

item.title: 西班牙法官将调查停电是否为网络攻击
item.description: 西班牙国家法院的一名法官已展开调查，以确定周一的全国大停电是否是一次网络攻击。【原文：A judge in Spain’s national court has opened an investigation to determine whether Monday’s countrywide blackout was a cyberattack.】
